lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I've been roamin' around, always lookin' down
At all I see
Painted faces fill the places
I can't reach

[Refrain]
You know that I could use somebody
You know that I could use somebody

[Verse 2]
Someone like you and all you know
And how you speak
Countless lovers under cover
Of the street

[Refrain]
You know that I could use somebody
You know that I could use somebody
Someone like you

[Verse 3]
Off in the night, while you live it up
I'm off to sleep
Wagin' wars to shape the poet
And the beat
I hope it's gonna make you notice
I hope it's gonna make you notice

[Chorus]
Someone like me
Someone like me
Someone like me
Somebody
Someone like me
Someone like me
Someone like me
Somebody

[Bridge]
Go and let it out
Go and let it out
Go and let it out
Go and let it out

[Chorus]
Someone like you
Somebody
Someone like you
Somebody
Someone like you
Somebody

[Outro]
I've been roamin' around, always lookin' down
At all I see
